bill.summary:
Santa Rosa Urban Water Reuse Plan Act - Amends the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior, in cooperation with the city of Santa Rosa, California, to participate in design, planning, and construction of projects to implement the Santa Rosa Urban Water Reuse Plan.
Limits the federal share to 25% of the total project costs. Prohibits the use of: (1) federal funds for operation or maintenance of an authorized project; or (2) funds authorized by this legislation for the development of new wetland areas.
Authorizes appropriations.
